p: Free radical scavenging capacity of the essential oil of M. paniculata and β-caryophyllene were evaluated by DPPH and ABTS methods, and the results are shown in Table 2. In the ABTS assay, the essential oil and β-caryophyllene showed no action even at the highest concentration tested (8 mg/mL). The antioxidant activity evaluated by DPPH method showed poor antioxidant activity according to the classification proposed by Scherer and Godoy ( 2009).
